displayProperties.name: Repulsor Brace
displayProperties.description: Defeating a Void-debuffed target grants an overshield that lasts for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: On Your Mark
displayProperties.description:
Precision final blows grant you and nearby allies increased weapon handling and reload speed for a short duration. Stacks 3 times.

Activating your class ability immediately grants maximum stacks of On Your Mark.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Tempering
displayProperties.description:
Solar weapon final blows grant you and your allies increased recovery for a short duration. Stacks 3 times.

While Ember of Tempering is active, your weapons have increased airborne effectiveness.

displayProperties.name: Well-Rounded
displayProperties.description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants a stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Eruption
displayProperties.description: Your Solar ignitions have increased area of effect.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Ashes
displayProperties.description: You apply more scorch stacks to targets.

displayProperties.name: Consecration
displayProperties.description:
While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to launch a wave of [Solar] Solar energy forward, damaging and scorching targets in front of you as you leap into the air.

While airborne, activate your charged melee again to slam to the ground and create a second larger wave of damaging [Solar] Solar energy. If the wave hits a scorched target, they ignite.

displayProperties.name: Gunpowder Gamble
displayProperties.description:
Defeat targets with abilities, Solar debuffs, or Solar weapons to charge up an improvised Solar explosive.

[Grenade]  : Throw a solar explosive that can be shot in mid-air to cause an ignition.

displayProperties.name: Killing Tally
displayProperties.description: Final blows increase this weapon's damage until it is stowed or reloaded. Improves magazine size.

displayProperties.name: Eager Edge
displayProperties.description: Gain increased Sword lunge distance immediately after switching to this weapon for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Sol Invictus
displayProperties.description:
Solar ability final blows, Hammer of Sol impacts, and defeating scorched targets creates Sunspots. Your abilities regenerate faster, and your Super drains more slowly while standing in a Sunspot.

Sunspots apply scorch and deal damage to targets inside. Entering a Sunspot applies restoration.

displayProperties.name: Roast 'Em
displayProperties.description: Improves Proximity Knife effectiveness and regeneration speed.

displayProperties.name: Burning Maul
displayProperties.description:
Summon a flaming maul and crush your enemies with the force of an earthquake.

[Light Attack]  : Spin the maul in a circle around you, damaging nearby targets.

[Heavy Attack]  : Slam the maul to the ground and create a cyclone of flames that seeks targets.

displayProperties.name: Hammer of Sol
displayProperties.description:
Summon a flaming hammer and wreak destruction down upon your enemies.

[Light Attack]  : Throw your hammer at foes.

Upon impact, your hammers shatter into explosive molten shards.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Wonder
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating multiple targets with Solar ignitions generates an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Blistering
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets with Solar ignitions grants grenade energy.

displayProperties.name: Stasis Empowerment
displayProperties.description:
While Stasis empowered:
- Stasis Supers have extended durations.
- Defeated combatants spawn Stasis mines.

On PRISM Day, Stasis empowerment is applied while using a Stasis subclass.

displayProperties.name: Shot in the Dark
displayProperties.description: Increases damage and weakens while invisible.

displayProperties.name: Fragile Focus
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains bonus range until the wielder takes damage. The bonus returns when no damage is taken for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Incandescent
displayProperties.description:
Defeating a target spreads a longer lasting scorch to those nearby.
More powerful combatants and opposing Guardians cause scorch in a larger radius.

displayProperties.name: Solar Empowerment
displayProperties.description:
While Solar empowered:
- Solar Supers have extended durations.
- You radiate damaging Solar energy.
- Damage resistance increases.
- You heal passively.

On PRISM Day, Solar empowerment is applied while using a Solar subclass.

displayProperties.name: Touch of Flame
displayProperties.description:
Your Healing, Solar, Firebolt, and Fusion Grenades have enhanced functionality.

Healing Grenade: Improves the strength of cure and restoration effects applied.

Solar Grenade: Increases linger duration. Periodically emits blobs of lava around its perimeter.

Firebolt Grenade: Increases target search radius and maximum target count.

Fusion Grenade: Explodes twice.

displayProperties.name: To Excess
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon while your Super is full grant a bonus to Strength and Discipline for a moderate duration.

displayProperties.name: Air Assault
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains further increased airborne effectiveness as your health gets lower.

displayProperties.name: Cold Steel
displayProperties.description: Powered Sword hits slow targets.

displayProperties.name: Aggressive Frame
displayProperties.description: Fires a three-round burst.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Searing
displayProperties.description: Defeating scorched targets grants melee energy.

displayProperties.name: Daybreak
displayProperties.description:
Fashion Solar Light into blades and smite your foes from the sky.

Your Daybreak projectiles launch a streak of deadly flames on impact.

displayProperties.name: Well of Radiance
displayProperties.description: Thrust your Sword into the ground, damaging and scorching nearby targets. The Sword projects a continuous aura, granting restoration and radiant effects to nearby allies, protecting them from the effects of Stasis.

displayProperties.name: Killing Tally
displayProperties.description: Kills increase this weapon's damage until it is stowed or reloaded.

displayProperties.name: Blunt Execution Rounds
displayProperties.description: Damaging nearby combatants with melee abilities dramatically increases handling and damage. Expires after an improved short duration or the next shot.

displayProperties.name: Gunpowder Gamble
displayProperties.description:
Defeat targets with abilities, Solar debuffs, or Solar weapons to charge up an improvised Solar explosive.

[Grenade]  : Throw a solar explosive that can be shot in mid-air to cause an ignition.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Solace
displayProperties.description: Radiant and restoration effects applied to you have increased duration.

displayProperties.name: Flame Harvesting
displayProperties.description: Solar Exotic final blows create Solar elemental wells.

displayProperties.name: Solar Fulmination
displayProperties.description: Your ignitions do increased damage in an increased radius.

displayProperties.name: Classy Restoration
displayProperties.description: Activating your Solar class abilities grants you restoration.

displayProperties.name: Radiant Orbs
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power makes you radiant.

displayProperties.name: Rays of Precision
displayProperties.description: While radiant, Solar precision final blows cause combatants to ignite.

displayProperties.name: Well-Rounded
displayProperties.description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants an improved stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.

displayProperties.name: Fragile Focus
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains bonus range until the wielder takes damage. The bonus returns when no damage is taken for a shorter duration.

displayProperties.name: Incandescent
displayProperties.description:
Defeating a target spreads scorch to those nearby.
More powerful combatants and opposing Guardians cause scorch in a larger radius.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Char
displayProperties.description: Your Solar ignitions spread scorch to affected targets.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Empyrean
displayProperties.description: Solar weapon or ability final blows extend the duration of restoration and radiant effects applied to you.

displayProperties.name: Golden Gun - Marksman
displayProperties.description:
Summon a precision flaming pistol that disintegrates targets with Solar Light.

Your Golden Gun deals massively increased precision damage, overpenetrates targets, and creates Orbs of Power on precision hits.

Benefits from being radiant.

displayProperties.name: Golden Gun - Deadshot
displayProperties.description:
Summon a rapid-fire flaming pistol that disintegrates targets with Solar Light.

Causing Solar ignitions while your Super is active refunds a Golden Gun round.

Benefits from being radiant.

displayProperties.name: Blade Barrage
displayProperties.description: Vault into the air and unleash a volley of Solar-charged explosive knives.

displayProperties.name: Iron Lord's Pride
displayProperties.description: Grants a chance to receive an Enhancement Prism as a reward at the end of Iron Banner matches.

displayProperties.name: Void Empowerment
displayProperties.description:
While Void empowered:
- Void Supers have extended durations.
- Void grenades and melee attacks deal increased damage.
- Crouching grants invisibility, Truesight, increased energy regeneration, and increased mobility.

On PRISM Day, Void empowerment is applied while using a Void subclass.

displayProperties.name: Solar Empowerment
displayProperties.description:
While Solar empowered:
- Solar Supers have extended durations.
- You radiate damaging Solar energy.
- Damage resistance increases.
- You heal passively.

On PRISM Day, Solar empowerment is applied while using a Solar subclass.

displayProperties.name: Knock 'Em Down
displayProperties.description:
Your Solar Supers are enhanced. Golden Gun - Deadshot has increased duration, Golden Gun - Marksman has increased damage resistance and duration, and Blade Barrage launches more projectiles.

While radiant, final blows with your equipped Throwing Knife fully refund your melee energy.

displayProperties.name: Fragment Magnet
displayProperties.description: Increased chance to find Solstice Key Fragments.

displayProperties.name: Piercing Sidearms
displayProperties.description:
Sidearms gain shield-piercing rounds, which bypass combatant defenses.

Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Scout Rifle
displayProperties.description:
Aiming down sights for a short time causes Scout Rifles you wield to fire a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Egregore Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a spore cloud to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Arc Empowerment
displayProperties.description:
While Arc empowered:
- Arc Supers have extended durations.
- Air and ground speed increases.
- Slide distance increases.
- Weapon handling and reload speed increases.
- Melee damage increases.
- Sword damage and lunge range increases.
- Sword ammo is granted every second while equipped.

On PRISM Day, Arc empowerment is applied while using an Arc subclass.

displayProperties.name: Glaive of Dreams
displayProperties.description: While you have a Glaive equipped, the Unstable Essence buff gained by picking up objects dropped by Nightmares has double its normal duration.

displayProperties.name: Revitalizing Blast
displayProperties.description: Stunning a Champion causes it to ignite and clears your shield stun.

displayProperties.name: Overload Trace Rifles
displayProperties.description:
Uninterrupted fire from your equipped Trace Rifles causes the beam to stun combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Void Resistance
displayProperties.description: Reduces incoming Void damage from combatants.

displayProperties.name: Subjugator Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a resonant appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Ghost Purple
displayProperties.description: Adds a purple Ghost ring to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Extrovert
displayProperties.description: Final blows while near multiple combatants or near Nightmares restores health.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Combustion
displayProperties.description: Final blows with your Solar Super cause targets to ignite.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Torches
displayProperties.description: Powered melee attacks against combatants make you and nearby allies radiant.

displayProperties.name: Roaring Flames
displayProperties.description: Final blows with Solar abilities or ignitions increase the damage of your Solar abilities. Stacks 3 times.

displayProperties.name: Solar Resistance
displayProperties.description: Reduces incoming Solar damage from combatants.

displayProperties.name: Trace Rifle Reserves
displayProperties.description: Increases the amount of Trace Rifle ammo you can carry.

displayProperties.name: Unquenchable Thirst
displayProperties.description: Increases the buff effect of the To Excess Origin Trait and the healing effect of the Souldrinker Origin Trait.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Singeing
displayProperties.description: Your class ability recharges faster when you scorch targets.

displayProperties.name: Heat Rises
displayProperties.description:
You can fire weapons, melee, and throw grenades while gliding.

[Grenade]  : Hold to activate Heat Rises, consuming your grenade.

Final blows while airborne increase the duration of Heat Rises and grant melee energy.

displayProperties.name: Fragment Magnet
displayProperties.description: Increased chance to find Solstice Key Fragments.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Beams
displayProperties.description: Your Solar Super projectiles have stronger target acquisition.

displayProperties.name: Unrepentant
displayProperties.description: Reloading after defeating a target grants a superburst.

displayProperties.name: Repulsor Brace
displayProperties.description: Defeating a Void-debuffed target grants an overshield.

displayProperties.name: Icarus Dash
displayProperties.description:
[Air Move]  : Dodge quickly while airborne.

While Heat Rises is active, you have an additional dodge.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Arc Empowerment
displayProperties.description:
While Arc empowered:
- Arc Supers have extended durations.
- Air and ground speed increases.
- Slide distance increases.
- Weapon handling and reload speed increases.
- Melee damage increases.
- Sword damage and lunge range increases.
- Sword ammo is granted every second while equipped.

On PRISM Day, Arc empowerment is applied while using an Arc subclass.

displayProperties.name: Be the Danger
displayProperties.description: Unrepentant final blows refund Unrepentant.

displayProperties.name: Exhumation
displayProperties.description: Charged heavy attacks turn you invisible.

displayProperties.name: Wraithwalk
displayProperties.description: Faster movement while invisible.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Benevolence
displayProperties.description: Applying restoration, cure,  or radiant to allies grants increased grenade, melee, and class ability regeneration for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Stasis Empowerment
displayProperties.description:
While Stasis empowered:
- Stasis Supers have extended durations.
- Defeated combatants spawn Stasis mines.

On PRISM Day, Stasis empowerment is applied while using a Stasis subclass.

displayProperties.name: Void Empowerment
displayProperties.description:
While Void empowered:
- Void Supers have extended durations.
- Void grenades and melee attacks deal increased damage.
- Crouching grants invisibility, Truesight, increased energy regeneration, and increased mobility.

On PRISM Day, Void empowerment is applied while using a Void subclass.

displayProperties.name: Myrmidon's Reach
displayProperties.description: Improves your Shield Throw melee.

displayProperties.name: Soaring Fusilier
displayProperties.description: Air dodge reloads weapons. Fusion Rifle and Linear Fusion Rifle final blows make you radiant.

displayProperties.name: Shotgun Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Shotguns over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Nightmarish Opulence
displayProperties.description: Increases the duration of the Psychohack Origin Trait and the effect of the Extrovert Origin Trait.

displayProperties.name: Trace Rifle Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases your chance of finding Special ammo while you have a Trace Rifle equipped.

displayProperties.name: Sidearm Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Sidearms over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Pulse Rifle Targeting
displayProperties.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Pulse Rifles.
